title: C Program Structure
subject: C Programming
theory:
Every C program adheres to a structure:
1. **Documentation** (Comments).
2. **Link** (Headers).
3. **Global Declaration**.
4. **Main() Function** (Entry point).
5. **Subprograms** (User defined functions).

common_mistakes.correction: Every C program must have exactly ONE main function.

exam_notes: Execution starts and ends at main().
